[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” css_animation=”fadeIn” css=”.vc_custom_1588718994577{background-color: #f5f4f2 !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1591925101278{padding-top: 0px !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”16204″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1593815036852{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”16501″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”16502″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]SDBI is a premier education institute for aspirants planning to enter the world of Data Science. Our vision is to nurture our students, expose them to some of the most real-time complex situations and offer them a distinctive platform to learn the smart ways of data science.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Campus Location: Patkar college, Piramal Nagar, Goregaon West, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400062.

Mobile: 9920053700 / 9920053700

Mail: info@sdbi.in / datascience@patkarvardecollege.edu.in[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”We are social on:” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_single_image image=”16152″ img_size=”50*50″ alignment=”center” onclick=”custom_link” img_link_target=”_blank” link=”https://www.facebook.com/sdbi.official/”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_single_image image=”16153″ img_size=”50*50″ alignment=”center” onclick=”custom_link” img_link_target=”_blank” link=”https://www.instagram.com/sdbiofficial/”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_single_image image=”16155″ img_size=”50*50″ alignment=”center” onclick=”custom_link” img_link_target=”_blank” link=”https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCxyDd_poB_6eMHP_vAPnhwA”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_single_image image=”16159″ img_size=”50*50″ alignment=”center” onclick=”custom_link” img_link_target=”_blank” link=”https://www.linkedin.com/company/sdbiofficial/”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”mkb-contact”][vc_custom_heading text=”Leave Us Your Info” use_theme_fonts=”yes”]
